titleStmt.title: VVorke for armorours: or, The peace is broken Open warres likely to happin this yeare 1609: Written by Thomas Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Nathaniel Butter dwelling in Poules Church-yard at the signe of the Pide-bull, neere S. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Poules Church-yard at the signe of the Pide-bull, neere S. Austins gate
